item.title: PNC to Buy Colorado’s FirstBank in $4.1 Billion Deal
item.description: PNC Financial Services Group Inc. agreed to purchase FirstBank Holding Co. for about $4.1 billion, adding branches in Colorado and Arizona and $26.8 billion in assets. Herman Chan of Bloomberg Intelli
